This page refers to testing SimpleOS in a emulated environment. for testing on a live environment see installation

Using QEMU

On linux platforms

To test Dawn on linux using QEMU ensure you have qemu installed (sudo apt-get install qemu on Ubuntu (And similar) distributions and similar. sudo yum install qemu on Fedora (And similar) distributions) Simply type sh test.sh from the root of the project directory (For example cd SimpleOSRepo then sh test.sh) And when prompted for a image enter hdd.img

Other

Currently not supported (Though images will probably be compatable with any platforms QEMU I choose not to support them as I have no meens to test)
